mapper.select: WITH FRANREVENUEMONTHVIEW AS( SELECT TO_CHAR(SELNG_DE, 'YYYY-MM') SELNG_DT , SELNG_AMOUNT FROM SELLING WHERE SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SELNG_DE),1,4) = SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE),1,4) ) SELECT SELNG_DT, SUM(SELNG_AMOUNT) SELNG_AMOUNT FROM FRANREVENUEMONTHVIEW GROUP BY SELNG_DT ORDER BY SELNG_DT

WITH FRANREVENUEMONTHVIEW AS( SELECT TO_CHAR(ADMINEXP_DE, 'YYYY-MM') EXP_DT , ADMINEXP_AMOUNT FROM ADMINEXP WHERE SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(ADMINEXP_DE),1,4) = SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE),1,4) ) SELECT EXP_DT, SUM(ADMINEXP_AMOUNT) EXP_AMOUNT FROM FRANREVENUEMONTHVIEW GROUP BY EXP_DT ORDER BY EXP_DT

SELECT B.* FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM( SELECT C.PROD_SLE_NM PROD_NM, SUM(ORDER_PROD_AMOUNT) PROD_TOTAL, F.CMMN_CODE_NM, E.PARTPROD_PC STORE_PC, SUM(E.PARTPROD_PC) STORE_TOTAL_PC, COUNT(*) PRODCNT FROM MEMORDER A INNER JOIN ORDERDT B ON (A.ORDER_DTLS_ID = B.ORDER_DTLS_ID) INNER JOIN PROD C ON (B.PROD_ID = C.PROD_ID) INNER JOIN ADMININV D ON (D.PROD_ID = C.PROD_ID) INNER JOIN PARTPROD E ON (D.PROD_ID = E.PROD_ID) INNER JOIN CMMNCODE F ON (E.PARTPROD_SE = F.CMMN_CODE_ID) GROUP BY C.PROD_SLE_NM,F.CMMN_CODE_NM, E.PARTPROD_PC ORDER BY PROD_TOTAL DESC) A
) B WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 5

SELECT C.PROD_SLE_NM PROD_NM, SUM(ORDER_PROD_AMOUNT) PROD_TOTAL, F.CMMN_CODE_NM, E.PARTPROD_PC STORE_PC, SUM(E.PARTPROD_PC) STORE_TOTAL_PC, COUNT(*) PRODCNT FROM MEMORDER A INNER JOIN ORDERDT B ON (A.ORDER_DTLS_ID = B.ORDER_DTLS_ID) INNER JOIN PROD C ON (B.PROD_ID = C.PROD_ID) INNER JOIN ADMININV D ON (D.PROD_ID = C.PROD_ID) INNER JOIN PARTPROD E ON (D.PROD_ID = E.PROD_ID) INNER JOIN CMMNCODE F ON (E.PARTPROD_SE = F.CMMN_CODE_ID) GROUP BY C.PROD_SLE_NM,F.CMMN_CODE_NM, E.PARTPROD_PC ORDER BY PROD_TOTAL DESC
